source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_00<tab>Steam appears to be rising from Midnight Dew's beautifully bedecked ears.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_00<tab>イディルシャイアのミッドナイト・デューは、怒りに満ちた顔をしている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_01<tab>Midnight Dew's entire stock has been stolen by a band of thieves, who have been seen escaping into the Sharlayan ruins. She asks you to assist her in tracking the bandits down, and bids you meet with her in the Answering Quarter to begin the hunt.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_01<tab>ミッドナイト・デューから話を聞いた。店の売り上げや高価な品が盗まれたらしい。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレアン学士街で「ミッドナイト・デュー」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_02<tab>You meet with Midnight Dew in the Answering Quarter and she briefs you on her plan to catch the robbers. As the stock they stole is too heavy to be transported on foot, she predicts that the bandits hope to escape by boat. While she contacts her comrades to have them stake out the riverbank, she asks that you investigate the Answering Quarter ruins to see if any sign of the bandits or their ill-gotten booty yet remains.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_02<tab>ミッドナイト・デューは仲間と河沿いを捜索するそうだ。シャーレアン学士街の廃墟で、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9B7D01 /var>」を探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_03<tab>You chance upon a trio of bandits guarding a chest and they immediately attack. Lay the thugs low and retrieve the stolen goods.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_03<tab>廃墟で、犯人たちと<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9B7D01 /var>を見つけたが、犯人たちが襲ってきた。妨害を退け、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9B7D01 /var>」を取り戻そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_04<tab>You collect the chest the thugs were guarding, a heavy casket of oak and gold marked with the initials “M” and “D.” Return the stolen goods to Midnight Dew to the north of the Answering Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2301 /var>を取り戻した。シャーレアン学士街の「ミッドナイト・デュー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2301 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_05<tab>You present the chest to Midnight Dew, who immediately recognizes it as her own. She thanks you for its recovery, and asks that you continue to lend her your expert assistance in retrieving the remainder of her inventory.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_SEQ_05<tab>ミッドナイト・デューに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2301 /var>を渡して、盗まれたものの一部を取り戻すことができた。引き続き、ミッドナイト・デューに協力しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Midnight Dew in the Answering Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_TODO_00<tab>シャーレアン学士街のミッドナイト・デューと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_TODO_03<tab>Return the stolen items to Midnight Dew in the Answering Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_TODO_03<tab>シャーレアン学士街のミッドナイト・デューに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B2301 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_000<tab>Gods damn it, I've been had! Some twice-cursed sons of a mad, blind bitch have made off with all my takin's, and my tradables, too! I knew this place was full of treasure hunters, but I never reckoned it'd be <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> treasures they'd be huntin'!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_000チッ……ヘマしちまったよ……。
店の売り上げと高価な品を、ごっそり盗まれちまった。
しかも、目撃者によれば、犯人は「人」だってのさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_001<tab>And it ain't just my losses that concern me. The gobbies count on the goods I bring in to keep this place fed and watered. If I don't get my stock back, this whole town could fall apart. What do you say, adventurer─will you help me bring these thievin' curs to book?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_001こいつは、ただの損害じゃ済まないよ。
ゴブリン族との信頼にも関わる……。
……アンタ、犯人を捕まえるのに協力してくれないかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_002<tab>An adventurer comin' back from the Answerin' Quarter says he bumped into a gang of ill-lookin' brutes on Frontbridge─nearly knocked the poor kid into the Thaliak, they did. Anyhow, he says they were headin' into the ruins─meet me there, and we'll start the search.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_002犯人は、「シャーレアン学士街」に逃げたようだ……。
そこで落ち合うとしようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_005<tab>The curs who stole my stock were seen headin' into the Answerin' Quarter. Meet me there and we'll hunt the bastards down.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_005犯人は、「シャーレアン学士街」に逃げたようだ……。
そこで落ち合うとしようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_010<tab>Well met, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Now, here's the plan: Considerin' the weight of the stuff they stole, they won't get far on foot─chances are they've got a boat hidden somewhere. I'll get onto my crew and have 'em stake out the riverbank.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_010来てくれたね……盗まれた品は結構な量だ。
それを一気に運ぶとなると、船を使う可能性が高い。
アタシは仲間に連絡して、河沿いを調べてみる。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_011<tab>In the meantime, I want you to search the ruins for whatever you can find. Might be the bandits are lyin' low out there, or maybe they've stashed the loot and moved on. If you should chance on any of my belongin's, I'd be obliged if you'd bring 'em back to me.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_011アンタは、廃墟の中を調べてくれるかい？
犯人どもが潜んでいるかもしれない。
荷物を見つけたら、取り返しておくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_020<tab>Understood, adventurer? I want you to search the ruins for bandits and booty. The booty you bring back to me─the bandits I'll leave to you, and the gods.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_020アンタは、廃墟の中を調べてくれるかい？
犯人どもが潜んでいるかもしれない。
荷物を見つけたら、取り返しておくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_030<tab>How goes the search, adventurer? Did you find anythin'?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_030アンタは、廃墟の中を調べてくれるかい？
犯人どもが潜んでいるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_031<tab>My stock! ...Well, one chest's worth of it, anyway. There's still some missin', but this is a damned good start! You've got the nose of a bloodhound, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─I'll be wantin' a lend of that sniffer of yours to track down the rest of my property!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ833_01963_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_031これは……確かに盗まれたものだね！
ふむ、全部ではないみたいだが、お手柄だ。
引き続き、よろしく頼むよ！
